notes: Inventory tracking approach: Track major consumables (proteins, bulk items like garlic, oats, pasta). Minor items (spices, baking staples) just track presence - Ben will flag when running low.

PERPETUAL STOCK IS MINIMAL: Only items listed are truly always on hand. Voice notes from Feb 13 are the source of truth. Gemini's original list had items Ben doesn't actually stock (green olives, golden raisins, salsa, ginger, onions, carrots, potatoes, etc). If not inventoried in voice notes, don't assume it's available.
Ben prefers BLACK olives over green olives.
Onions: 4 on hand (bought 1 on Feb 21, had 3 from prior purchase). Olives + pepperoni also bought Feb 15.
Ben is willing to pre-dice and freeze vegetables in Ziploc bags if it helps with bulk prep.
Air fryer best for reheating, not cooking.
Wok is impractical for bulk prep (tiny capacity, no gas stove).
Spices inventory complete - 46 spices/seasonings cataloged. Paprika and red pepper flakes restocked on 2026-02-21.
Oils/vinegars inventoried - cooking wines trashed (old/processed), rice vinegar well stocked.
Fridge inventoried - fats (tallow, schmaltz), sauces, almond milk, eggs.
Butter/ghee in fridge but DO NOT use in Ben's recipes (dairy-free).
Stir fry sauce + black soy sauce are Sheenah's (not GF).

CHEST FREEZER COMPLETE. Full kitchen inventory done.
